Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika

i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2021 foieïn¾ ui 31 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2021 foieïn¾ ui 17 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh

Èid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - leianEj
fkdjákd kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj wjika lrk ,o j¾I 5lg jvd mer‚ my; wxl i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2022'03'10 Èfkka miqj 
fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¨iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
   02' fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yajlrejl= ;udg wjYH iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda tys hï fldgila ,nd 
.ekSug wjYH kï tA i|yd b,a¨ïm;% 2022'03'10 Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;=h'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2021'12'10

;%sl=Kdu,h Èid wêlrKfha § h
ãt*aiSiS nexl=j
wxl 73$5" .d¨ mdr"
fld<U 03'
'''''''''''''''''''meñ‚,slre'
tÈßj
1' f,dfrkaiq fyajf.a iÑ;a iór
2' f,dfrkaiq fyajf.a ir;a fofokdu
wxl 581$10"
Èuq;=.u" 
Ökjrdh"
;%sl=Kdu,h'
'''''''''''''''''''ú;a;slrejka'
fuu kvqfõ 2018 la jQ fmnrjdß ui 28 jeks Èk we;=,;a lr we;s ;Ska;s m%ldYh m%ldrj meñ‚,af,a wdhdpkfha weho 
we;s mßÈ remsh,a 1"600"000 l uqo,la iy tlS uqo, kvqj f.dkq l< Èkfha isg iïmQ¾K uqo, f.jk f;la ffk;sl fmd,sh 
iy nexl= .dia;=o we;=,;aj wh lr .eksug by; lS 1 jeks iy 2 jeks ú;a;slrejkag tfrysj ;Skaÿjla yd ;Skaÿ m%ldYhla
